ValidationRule.description: Primary QE Approval / AE Response field is locked when the status is Risk Assessment.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Id = '00e1J000000h0jF', NOT(ISPICKVAL( status__c, 'Risk Assessment')), Ischanged( qualityEngineerApproval__c ), NOT(ISNEW()))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The QA cannot change the Primary QE Approval / AE Response field once the status is Risk Assessment.
